sub_topic: Identifying the maximum independent set in a graph.
message_1:
Consider the following undirected graph:

```
      A---B
     /|   |\
    / |   | \
   /  |   |  \
  C   D---E   F
```

What is the maximum independent set of vertices in this graph?
message_2: In this graph, the maximum independent set of vertices is {A, C, F}. This set has three vertices, and no two vertices in the set are adjacent. There is no larger independent set in this graph.
